response.original_title: The Gate of Heaven: The Story of Saint Thomas Church Fifth Avenue
response.overview: Produced in 2001, this hour-long documentary on the 175-year history of Saint Thomas Church was produced and directed by Paul G. Sanderson III of Our Town Films, Inc. Originally broadcast on PBS, viewer comments ranged from "magnificent" and "remarkable" to "one of the best television programs I have seen in a long time." The film had its world premiere at the Museum of Modern Art and was screened at the New York Independent Film & Video Festival. The film has also been awarded a CINE Golden Eagle, a Crystal Award of Excellence and a Telly Award.
response.tagline: History of Saint Thomas Church Fifth Avenue
response.title: The Gate of Heaven: The Story of Saint Thomas Church Fifth Avenue
